title: Build find-dupes.py - duplicate detection
description: Identify exact duplicates (same MD5) and near-duplicates (filename variants like Document (1).docx, backups, etc.)
close_reason: find-dupes.py completed - found 105,916 exact duplicates (113GB), 104 junk files, 8 near-dupes for review

title: Build manifest.py - file inventory with hashes
